page.title: 19Shopping in Coatbridge
page.content: The biggest shop in Coatbridge is called Asda. This is owned by Associated Dairies. It sells food mainly but also clothes and household items. Lots of the mums in our school work in it , usually part- time. There is a big free car park and they also sell petrol which is cheaper than anywhere else. It is 199.9pense per gallon just now. there are other shops in the town centre which are all near Asda. There are lots of shoe shops. There are lots of local buses which take you to the town centre. Some of the shops open on a Sunday but not all of them.
